GuessResult - Class in org.fdu
Data Class for processing user guesses Defines an ENUM for guess status = VALID or INVALID Three data elements: guessStatus - VALID or INVALID guessEvaluation - array of Result enums denoting color of each character in guess
GuessResult.GuessStatus - Enum Class in org.fdu
 
GuessValidation - Class in org.fdu
GuessValidation Class Codes validation rules including length (exactly 5 characters), allowable characters (a-z and A-Z) Normalizes the guess (removes leading and trailing white space), shifts all characters to UPPERCASE WORD_LENGTH - defines the length for guesses and secret words
GuessValidation() - Constructor for class org.fdu.GuessValidation
 
GuessValidation.ValidationReason - Enum Class in org.fdu
ValidationReason includes: enum and code (ie ASCII string for the enum) Currently - enum ASCII = enum.name() ValidationReason constructor - creates each object and populates the String code getReasonString() - returns String associated with the enum object getReasonEnum() - returns enum object associated with the string, UNKNOWN enum if string not valid
GuessValidation.ValidationResult - Record Class in org.fdu
Record encapsulating results of a Wordle word validation including validity and enum reason details.
